Description:
Exception is thown out when select two labels.

Build number: 
2.3.0.v20071126-0800

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report with one labels.
2. Select the label and switch to Property Editro->Border.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
